content: The most important project you’ll ever manage is yourself. It’s a concept I drive home with the clients I work with. Having the ability to recognize costs and resources, sharpen core competencies and prioritize as necessary is invaluable. We’re all given 24 hours each day to spend and invest. A defining factor in developing an overall feeling of success and personal wellbeing is the ability to choose how we invest the time we have. Enjoyed the piece.
